description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows cryptographic services security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-26228), follow the steps below to apply the necessary updates:

1. Download the latest cumulative updates corresponding to your build number from the official Microsoft Update catalog.
2. Install the updates KB-5036925, KB-5036894, KB-5036893, and KB-5036892 as per the guidance presented in the MSRC release notes.
3. Restart your system after each update installation to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- Ensure your system is running one of the affected Windows builds: [10.0.19045.4291, 10.0.19044.4291, 10.0.22631.3447, 10.0.22000.2899, 10.0.22621.3447, 10.0.10240.20596].
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installations to prevent any data loss during the patch process.
